item.title: Async FSM using UniTask
item.description: In this post I’m going through steps to implement an asynchronous finite-state machine (FSM) in Unity, using async/await library UniTask. In the end you will have a nice modular state machine with all the FSM stuff you would expect. You can follow along or hop directly to my GitHub to explore the repository which contains the full project. Requirements Unity 2020.2+ UniTask I recommend installing UniTask via git URL using Unity’s package manager.
